EmailTemplate.description: FTTA. Created for the email notification to be sent to FTTA when the agreement is created.
EmailTemplate.name: Email notification to FTTA - License created using HTML
EmailTemplate.subject: EPA File # {!EPA_Agreement__c.EPA_File_2__c} - Created
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
A new agreement has been created and is ready to be assigned.
To access the agreement, please click the below link.
{!EPA_Agreement__c.Name}
Thank you
